elements.name: s3q3
elements.title:
Your organization must appoint an "event response coordinator."
The "event response coordinator" will be in charge of:

1. being the point of contact when a data breach occurs; 
2. coordinating with the different departments within the organization to handle data breaches; and 
3. filling out the necessary paperwork to document the data breach and the organization's remedial measures.
Who is your organization's "event response coordinator"?

elements.name: question2
elements.title:
Your organization must designate a committee to oversee the data breach response process.
Many business and nonprofits designate the Board of Directors.

Will the Board of Directors be the committee that oversees the data breach process?

elements.name: s3q6
elements.title: What committee will oversee the data breach process?

elements.name: s3q7
elements.title: Who within that committee will be the principal point of contact in case of a data breach?

completedHtml: Thank you for sharing your information with us
